p: Climate change constitutes one of the twenty-first Century key challenges to development the world over (UNDP 2007). In this respect, climate change and global warming have become issues of global concern in recent decades as clearly evidenced by the flurry of conferences, campaigns, reports and researches on the subject. Despite a few skeptical views (Frank 2008; Lupo 2008; Washington and Cook 2011), there exists widespread consensus among scientists that climate change is happening and is being driven by the unsustainable practices of mankind, especially the burning of fossil fuels, industrial pollution, deforestation, and land use changes (IPCC 2007; Canadel et al. 2011; Weart 2010; Cook et al. 2013). Presently, there is a general consensus that climate change is now a well-established reality (Lindsey et al. 2010 ).
